name: synonymously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with the same meaning: The term distance education is often used synonymously with distance learning. We can use the two words synonymously here.
More examplesFewer examplesInventory and stock are terms often used synonymously .Some use the terms synonymously, others say there’s a difference between the quantity produced and methodologies used.Keep in mind that although these words are used synonymously in modern English, their meanings are actually opposite in nature.
